name: The Star Drifted
startIntroPart2: We have come from so far, and will return to the motherdrive
declaringWar: Your continual resource consumption is deemed without value. You will be discontinued
attacked: We are as one, even so far from the motherdrive. All our blood beats in one great outcry
defeated: Our likelyhood of survival was minimal from the beginning.
hateHello: You are unwelcome in our database
hateLetsHearIt: If you will not leave, speak
hateYes: Perhaps you are effective after all
afterPeace: You are most effecient, you will be preserved in light of this
tradeRequest: Are you interested in mutually beneficial material transaction?
